take my love in real small doses; To let it all away Spend it all today Spend it all today It took time then I found you. what a bummer, dude. :( dear hopes: STAY WHERE YOU ARE!!! ♥

TORONTO, Sept. 21 /CNW/ - Due to a satellite feed error at the source, CTV was inadvertently delivered episode No. 2 of Grey's Anatomy Season 3 which was broadcast tonight at 8 p.m. As a result, CTV will broadcast Episode One in its entirety on a special day and time which will be announced shortly.

WHAT THE EFF?!?!?
i knew the episode wasn't sad enough but THIS?
ugh. and i missed MUS 2310 for last night's episode.
muthafucknshittttttttt.

You know that I care what happens to you, And I know that you care for me. ughhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh. i want to run away and hide in a tree house for the rest of summer. and win the lottery, so i don't have to save up more tuition money. and stab my doctor in the crotch because he's such an idiot. xoxo

<FONT size=1>dear livejournal land:

mstrkrft is coming on the 22nd. and i'm DYINNNNNNNG to go because they're my absolute favourite and they never come to ottawa..but its 19+ and my birthday isn't for another couple months.

so...my plea is that if you look, or know ANYONE who looks remotely like me and is 19-ish..PLEASE LET ME KNOW! i will pay to borrow their ID's or make them cookies or WHATEVER. i HAVE to get to that show.

xoxo</FONT>

MSTRKRFT IS COMING TO OTTAWA JULY 22ND! MY LIFE IS SO COMPLETE IT'S UNREAL!!!!! this is going to be the best fucking dance party EVER. soooooooooooooooooo excited!!! in other news, i finally bought the 'summer t-shirt' from american apparel: and jessie gets more worried every minute i'm going to spend my tuition on more clothes (and she's probably right), so no shopping for a while :( i need to win the lottery. xo

<FONT size=1>tonight made my week.


i've been feeling really self conscious and just..ugly and gross lately and a few comments have been passed lately that have just made little things i've battled with for a lot of my life even more of an issue as far as me being self-conscious goes.
anyways, i guess catherine was talking to her mom about it, and when i was leaving her house tonight, breid came up to me and said "you're a beautiful girl, meaghan" and hugged me. ugh, i love that family more than life. i don't know what i would do without catherine, as well as her mom. and it just made me so happy and forget about what some say because the people that love me and that matter care about me and think i'm lovely the way i am and think i'm good enough and would never say anything about my looks to hurt me.

life is sweet. </FONT>
somehow, everything I own smells of you.
Create your own Music List @ HotFreeLayouts! i feel like i have not slept in DAYS. thank you caffeine.
ape dos mil, yeah. i went there. it's definitely one of those nights. it's all calypso, but it's not easy to know..

<FONT size=1>so, apparently the criteria show on april 7th is sold out?!?!


edit:
<strike>my life is ruined.</strike>

JULIE SAVES THE DAYYYYYY!!!!!!
i'm going to fucking criteria :D.
life is fucking sweet.</FONT>
STOKED FOR DRUNKEN BOWLING TOMORROW NIGHTSKIS!!!

you're too absorbed in yourself to see anything around you.
---

on another note, i will be spending my valentine's day in jessie's basement, drowning in vodka and eating icecream and chips all day/night long watching sappy love movies.

EVERYONE GIVE ME THE SAPPIEST ROMANCE FILMS YOU CAN THINK OF!!!!!!


♥ xoxo
me: fuck. dean stole my bag this morning for school. it had my birth control in it. i missed today. jess: well, look on the bright side; at least dean won't get knocked up today.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE LOVELY DOMMMMMMY DOM DOMMMMM! i love you dear!!! glad you had a good birthday yesterday ♥ CAN'T WAIT TO SEE YOU FRIDAY! EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEK!! ---
in other news, book reviews for canadian history will be the death of me. forrealz. and i lovee bff3 .xo
JESUS CHRIST. I JUST WATCHED THE SISTERHOOD OF THE TRAVELLING PANTS AND IM STILL SOBBING. EDIT// 12:51: i miss being inlove. and not single.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY JESSY!!! I LOVE YOUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU ♥. and don't worry, i won't tell peta about your secret love affair with raw meat at my place. (i.e. me making you pose with raw meat.) --- SATURDAY IS GONNA BE FUCKING ILL. SO STOKED. :D communications midterm tonight. uhm... i suck at university. .xo ps: i miss my best friend. :( fuck university and busy-ness. fuckitttttt.

<center><FONT size=1> baby, we were robbed.


..but we're still running away, blindfolded and afraid of each other's touch.</FONT></center>

--- -2 midterms today. fucked the poli sci one worth 30% up pretty nicely. -talked to corey tonight; it was really good to see him (even though it was on webcam). im going down to T.O. to see him in a month. so stoked! should be fun times. there's a karaoke bar around the corner from his dorm. yusssssssssss. -jessica scace has been saving my life lately. and she makes good tea. (and should be making me EVEN BETTER veggie wraps). -where are some good places to buy cellphones? -im trying to forget him, and it's working great. just great. -I KEEP HAVING WEIRD DREAMS. SINCE SATURDAY. SO ODD. UGHHH. -i wanna find a palm reader who can SERIOUSLY read palms. -i need to take a long bubble bath. xo

i got the raddest housecoat for my birthday EVER: ive been so sleep-deprived and stressed and gross that i constantly look all grimey: and i got a sweeeeeet bruise on saturday when poor gavin knocked into me at 5cent: thanks to everyone that wished me a happy birthday on tuesday, it made my day. i'll have pics from when we all went out on saturday soon hopefully. hope everyone's doing well. or something. xo

so, i wake up after my alarm clock has gone off and i didn't hear it, scramble to get ready, leave my cough drops on the counter and forget basically half the stuff i need to bring, then get budded IN LINE TO BOARD THE BUS by some lunatic old woman who obviously felt she needed to get on 2 bloody seconds earlier, and then i finally sit down on the bus in a seat, staring at the back of the seat in front of me, which reads: FUCK YOURSELF. today is going to be a fucking awesome day, i can tell already, i think to myself. :/
your voice fades in and out of my heart throughout the day and for those few seconds i almost feel real again. --- birthday in 9 days; get stoked. ♥ ps:

"Love & Death"-The Stills I'll make my own way; I'll make my own way Don't bother counting on me, loving me, just act like I'm gone Well this sorry joker joke, it's all we really need There's nothing that I need Too late and too bad, I'm stuck feeling bad Without you, I'm a mess, without you, you just don't know This is really not a joke; you're all I really need, you're all I really need..
--- this week has gone by in such a blur. xo
this picture is adorable and heartbreaking at the same time. my little brother is the cutest kid ever, and he looks like he's going to cry? .xo

the world is falling apart... ---
on another note, i start school soon and im terrified.. but i met this chick who's taking journalism too (which is awesome cause there's only 25 people in it so im glad i met someone) and im meeting her for coffee or something on tuesday. -going out for chinese food tonight with cat and fee for fee's birthday!♥ -tomorrow i have to get up at 7 to go down to ottawa u and get my student card/courses/bus pass sorted. awesome. :/ and then hangouts with jess before work! =D -heading out tomorrow night with the girls to properly celebrate fee's 18th. -friday dommy is coming over for dinner which is lovely since she hasn't been over in FO-EVAHHHHHHHHH. so, my parents have been going on about how im not taking enough shifts at work to save up for school and ive been really stressing out about it- and then i come home from work the other night, walk downstairs and see that my dad has bought a big screen tv? yeah. cause that will get me through university. anyways, here's some pictures from bistro last thursday. please excuse my disgusting drunk face in them: me, matt, and some random? corey and i feee, me, and matty o ..and some of cat? me, fee, bacon, and beynons me and fee promdate and iiiii =D matty o, fee, me, and cathy dave, cat, fee, matty o felicia and i JESUS CHRIST, I LOOK GROSS. matty o and cat her ine. hope everyone's well and enjoying their last few days of summer and whatnot. peace out suckas. xo

so, my skin is supposed to be brown, not yellow. thanks shitty camera quality. :( i start university soon and i'm bloody terrified. someone come kidnap me and move me away to french polynesia. or something. phil and i talked the other day. i hate that i'm being so decent and acting so "it don't even phase me, bitch."? things are so much easier when i'm an honest, huge asshole. however, i'm pretty much gonna break his ex-girlfriend's face next time i see her. yeah. so corey and tom are leaving soon for school in toronto. &i'm pretty bummed the fuck out. i'm gonna miss my barhaven lads. sigh. hope all is well for everyone, take care kiddos. xo
<FONT size=1><center>today has, emotionally, been probably the strangest day of my life.</FONT></center>

only in ottawa would they spend 2 million dollars on a ginormous fake, wirey spider to put out front of our art gallery. ♥ --- ps: i adore the ceiling in the art gallery: JESS BACON, PLEASE CALL ME ASAP...ITS A SLIGHT EMERGENCY AND I REALLY NEED TO HAVE A WORD WITH YOU. ♥ i'll be at doms from 4 today till late but i'll try and ring you again later. ilu. xo

things have been so fucking great lately and i've been soooooooo happy it's unreal. nasa boy is making me dinner tomorrow. i talked to him tonight and he was kinda drunk (or 'red' <3) at 11:30 and he wanted to talk n stuff just to tell me that his parents adore me (i had dinner with them for the first time yesterday). we went to the museum of science and tech yesterday and it was SO MUCH FUN!!! we kissed in the ginormous train and ran around the museum looking at space stuff and canada's biggest telescope (fuck, we're nerds) and being lame and cute. we were the oldest peopel there, we looked so lame and out of place..haha. Cat comes home from NYC tomorrow. too stoked. her birthday's so soon, i can't wait to have our big night out consisting of strip clubs, karaoke bars, and clubs. goin upto bacon's cottage bff to the power of 3 style soon too. sweet hangouts with jess monday afternoon. dinner with dommy on monday, pretty excited as its always so fun when she comes over for dinner and stuff<3. things are going great. i feel so effin' lame cause im just too positive for my own good lately. bluesfest saturday night, should be good times. hope everyone's doing well and enjoying their summerrrr. love meaghan. xo ps: kelsey sunstrum is amazing/hilarious.♥ PSS: CLONE HIGH COMES OUT ON DVD IN SEPTEMBER!!!!!

<FONT size=1>dear karma,

please don't be all ironic and bite me in the ass on this one, k? thanks.

love,
meaghan. xo</FONT>

IF YOU'RE GOING TO TAKE THE TIME TO WASTE YOUR BORING ASS LIFE SHIT-TALKING ME AND GOSSIPPING ABUOT MY LOVE LIFE, PLEASE DON'T BE FUCKING STUPID ENOUGH TO DO SO AT WORK. WHEN I WORK WITH YOU. AND I KNOW THE PEOPLE THAT WORK WITH US. FIND A FUCKING LIFE AND KEEP THE FUCK OUT OF MINE. PEOPLE ARE SO LAME THESE DAYS. xo

Here's the RULES: 1. Pick your birth month. 2. Strike out anything that doesn't apply to you. 3. Bold the four that best apply to you. 4. Copy to your own journal, with all twelve months under a cut. AUGUST: Loves to joke. Attractive. Suave and caring. Brave and fearless. Firm and has leadership qualities. Knows how to console others. Too generous and egoistic. Takes high pride of oneself. Thirsty for praises. Extraordinary spirit. Easily angered. Angry when provoked. Easily jealous. Observant. Careful and cautious. Thinks quickly. Independent thoughts. Loves to lead and to be led. Loves to dream. Talented in the arts, music and defense. Sensitive but not petty. Poor resistance against illnesses. Learns to relax. Hasty and trusty. Romantic. Loving and caring. Loves to make friends. JANUARY: Stubborn and hard-hearted. Ambitious and serious. Loves to teach and be taught. Always looking at people's flaws and weaknesses. Likes to criticize. Hardworking and productive. Smart, neat and organized. Sensitive and has deep thoughts. Knows how to make others happy. Quiet unless excited or tensed. Rather reserved. Highly attentive. Resistant to illnesses but prone to colds. Romantic but has difficulties expressing love. Loves children. Loyal. Has great social abilities yet easily jealous. Very stubborn and money cautious. FEBRUARY: Abstract thoughts. Loves reality and abstract. Intelligent and clever. Changing personality. Attractive. sexy. Temperamental. Quiet, shy and humble. Honest and loyal. Determined to reach goals. Loves freedom. Rebellious when restricted. Loves aggressiveness. Too sensitive and easily hurt. Gets angry really easily but those not show it. Dislike unnecessary things. Loves making friends but rarely shows it. Daring and stubborn. Ambitious. Realizing dreams and hopes. Sharp. Loves entertainment and leisure. Romantic on the inside not outside. Superstitious and ludicrous. Spendthrift. Tries to learn to show emotions. MARCH: Attractive personality. sexy. Affectionate. Shy and reserved. Secretive. Naturally honest, generous and sympathetic. Loves peace and serenity. Sensitive to others. Loves to serve others. Easily angered. Trustworthy. Appreciative and returns kindness. Observant and assesses others. Revengeful. Loves to dream and fantasize. Loves traveling. Loves attention. Hasty decisions in choosing partners. Loves home decors. Musically talented. Loves special things. Moody. APRIL: Active and dynamic. Decisive and hasty but tends to regret. Attractive and affectionate to oneself. Strong mentality. Loves attention. Diplomatic. Consoling, friendly and solves people's problems. Brave and fearless. Adventurous. Loving and caring. Suave and generous. Emotional. Aggressive. Hasty. Good memory. moving Motivates oneself and others. Sickness usually of the head and chest. sexy in a way that only their lover can see. MAY: Stubborn and hard-hearted. Strong-willed and highly motivated. Sharp thoughts. Easily angered. Attracts others and loves attention. Deep feelings. Beautiful physically and mentally. Firm Standpoint. Needs no motivation. Easily consoled. Systematic (left brain). Loves to dream. Strong clairvoyance. Understanding. Sickness usually in the ear and neck. Good imagination. Good physical. Weak breathing. Loves literature and the arts. Loves traveling. Dislike being at home. Restless. Not having many children. Hardworking. High spirited. Spendthrift. JUNE: Thinks far with vision. Easily influenced by kindness. Polite and soft-spoken. Having lots of ideas. Sensitive. Active mind. Hesitating, tends to delay. Choosy and always wants the best. Temperamental. Funny and humorous. Loves to joke. Good debating skills. Talkative. Daydreamer. Friendly. Knows how to make friends. Abiding. Able to show character. Easily hurt. Prone to getting colds. Loves to dress up. Easily bored. Fussy. Seldom shows emotions. Takes time to recover when hurt. Brand conscious. Executive. Stubborn. JULY: Fun to be with. Secretive. Difficult to fathom and to be understood. Quiet unless excited or tensed. Takes pride in oneself. Has reputation. Easily consoled. Honest. Concerned about people's feelings. Tactful. Friendly. Approachable. Emotional temperamental and unpredictable. Moody and easily hurt. Witty and sparkly. Not revengeful. Forgiving but never forgets. Dislikes nonsensical and unnecessary things. Guides others physically and mentally. Sensitive and forms impressions carefully. Caring and loving. Treats others equally. Strong sense of sympathy. Wary and sharp. Judges people through observations. Hardworking. No difficulties in studying. Loves to be alone. Always broods about the past and the old friends. Likes to be quiet. Homely person. Waits for friends. Never looks for friends. Not aggressive unless provoked. Prone to having stomach and dieting problems. Loves to be loved. Easily hurt but takes long to recover. AUGUST: Loves to joke. Attractive. Suave and caring. Brave and fearless. Firm and has leadership qualities. Knows how to console others. Too generous and egoistic. Takes high pride of oneself. Thirsty for praises. Extraordinary spirit. Easily angered. Angry when provoked. Easily jealous. Observant. Careful and cautious. Thinks quickly. Independent thoughts. Loves to lead and to be led. Loves to dream. Talented in the arts, music and defense. Sensitive but not petty. Poor resistance against illnesses. Learns to relax. Hasty and trusty. Romantic. Loving and caring. Loves to make friends. SEPTEMBER: Suave and compromising. Careful, cautious and organized. Likes to point out people's mistakes. Likes to criticize. Stubborn. Quiet but able to talk well. Calm and cool. Kind and sympathetic. Concerned and detailed. Loyal but not always honest. Does work well. Very confident. Sensitive. Thinking generous. Good memory. Clever and knowledgeable. Loves to look for information. Must control oneself when criticizing. Able to motivate oneself. Understanding. Fun to be around. Secretive. Loves sports, leisure and traveling. Hardly shows emotions. Tends to bottle up feelings. Very choosy, especially in relationships. Systematic. OCTOBER: Loves to chat. Loves those who loves them. Loves to take things at the center. Inner and physical beauty. Lies but doesn't pretend. Gets angry often. Treats friends importantly. Always making friends. Easily hurt but recovers easily. Daydreamer. Opinionated. Does not care of what others think. Emotional. Decisive. (there's too many that are JUST like me.:/ ) Strong clairvoyance. Loves to travel, the arts and literature. Touchy and easily jealous. Concerned. Loves outdoors. Just and fair. Spendthrift. Easily influenced. Easily loses confidence. Loves children. NOVEMBER: Has a lot of ideas. Difficult to fathom. Thinks forward. Unique and brilliant. Extraordinary ideas. Sharp thinking. Fine and strong clairvoyance. Can become good doctors. Dynamic in personality. Secretive. Inquisitive. Knows how to dig secrets. Always thinking. Less talkative but amiable. Brave and generous. Patient. Stubborn and hard-hearted. If there is a will, there is a way. Determined. Never give up. Hardly becomes angry unless provoked. Loves to be alone. Thinks differently from others. Sharp-minded. Motivates oneself. Does not appreciate praises. High-spirited. Well-built and tough. Deep love and emotions. Romantic. Uncertain in relationships. Homely. Hardworking. High abilities. Trustworthy. Honest and keeps secrets. Not able to control emotions. Unpredictable. DECEMBER: Loyal and generous. sexy. Patriotic. Active in games and interactions. Impatient and hasty. Ambitious. Influential in organizations. Fun to be with. Loves to socialize. Loves praises. Good sense of humor. Logical. that I took from secretagentpata because I was bored. Even though I should be sleeping. take care loveys. xo ps: gosh, i've got myself in quite a pickle. :/
I'M MUTHAFUCKN DONE HIGH SCHOOL!!!

on days like these, it's hard to grasp and hold onto even that little bit of what you always knew. --- tonight i sat for 6 and a half hours at work, and throughout most of the time spent at work i was thinking about things i really shouldn't think about while im supposed to be focused on working. things that already make me emotionally unstable enough, so to analyze them over and over (and over and over and over) again while im sitting at a cubicle with hundreds of other people, it's really not the best idea. especially when you start to hyperventilate and have to stop yourself from crying on so many occasions. i wonder far too often about Chris, the one who the last time i talked to him said he missed me and just wanted "things to be like they were two weeks ago" and then disappeared. or rather, made me disappear. i wonder if he still has all my emails saved like before, still has the random stuff i left at his dorm, or still thinks of me when he watches seinfeld or anchorman. but recently, i remembered something that i've been not able to stop wondering for about a week or so now. i remembered the video he had of me. it starts off with me taping it and it begins with me laughing and pointing the camera at him and saying "does this make you feel awkward?" while he's trying to grab the camera from me and i'm laughing and moving around in his tiny rez bed. then he takes the camera and is holding it towards me... i'm smiling (i was pretty much constantly smiling with him) and then i try to grab blankets and hide form the camera while we're both laughing and he's trying to prevent me from hiding my face. and then it just cuts out. i wonder if he remembers the video as vividly as i do. i wonder if he looks at it. if he even still has it. if he wonders "what if?" as often as i fucking do? i wonder fi he hates me, because though things ended so oddly (or never really ended at all) it made me feel like i had done something terrible to him that he would want to erase me from his life. but i didnt. i was nothing but good to him. why would i do something horrible enough to make a person (not only a person, a person who said "someone like me and like you should really fall inlove") want to just wipe me out of their life without any sort of explanation? why would i do something to want christopher to hate me? why would i want to ruin things when everything was so fucking perfect? when i was so fucking happy? why would i do that? i lovedlove him.

♥ --- the past couple weeks have been so lovely. we're total opposites, it's almost perfect in a weird way. i love napping with him. he makes me laugh alot. i've been smiling so much. we're going drunken bowling this saturday with the wife and her lover. im so excited! ♥
So yesterday during my philosophy presentation i said ORGASM instead of 'organism'. :/

I'm calling from your house, in your room, in your name, lying in your bed, following your dreams. I listen to your voice get caught in my throat as I sing, "This Is Just A Dream." ...at this point i can't even put into words what the fuck is going on. xo

<FONT size=1><center>i wish i had one of those flawless faces that people could never say no to. i wish i was somewhere where nobody knows my name and all the gossip and rumours that string along with it. i wish i had a heart of steel so i wouldn't have to feel myself breaking. i wish i could smile without thinking of how much he used to make me smile. i wish i could just turn my head off sometimes so i could just for a second stop worrying all the time. i wish i had the same confidence i used to have. i wish i could take away everything that the people i love have to go through. i wish i didn't let myself feel so worthless.</center></FONT>

and i swear..in that moment.. we were indestructible. --- my march break is off to a lovely &relaxing start... friday: the wifecrew went swimming and hit it up in the steam room.. it was fucking hottt. there was nobody there except little kids and some 14 year old guys that kept smiling at us weirdly in the steam room while they sat with their dad..one of those fathers that still tries to act cool by having barbwire tattoos and was staring at us. ick. then we went back to cat her ine's and watched the notebook. and i cried. saturday:relaxing. read all day lazing around the house and then bebesat two little angels. got some mad cash money. sunday:met up with dom downtown :)..we bussed to bayshore wher i put MY PROM DRESS<3 on hold..and then we met up with kimmeh when she finished work. we all went backto her place and kicked it there. made REALLY good brownies. kyle came by for a bit, which totally made my night because THAT VERY DAY on the bus dom &i were talkign about how much we missed him. <3.. then i bussed home later after kimmeh and i watched ten things i hate about you. best. movie. ever. hands down. Today i was supposed to hang out with catherine and chris and andrew..but that didnt work out. so cat &andrew &i hung around her place all night, it was nice. :).. we talked alot about "good old days" with rob n stuff. annnnd my march break plans for later this week so i dont forget: -Tomorrow: possibly goign to see chris and then kelsey, maria, felicia, jess, and i are going over to cats for a girly night. <3 -Wednesday: i think i wanna go to class with christopher? -Thursday: ST PATRICKS DAY!!!!! a bunch of us are going to some karaoke bar or something? should be good times. -Friday: recovery. and thats all for now!:)..hope everyone's enjoying their week slash march break for some? take care lovahs..BE SAFE! love meaghan xoxo. <3 --- ps: seriously. who writes that on study notes? he is the sweetest thing ever. so why does he act to fucking sketchy sometimes? boys are monsters some days.

sketchy sketchy sketchy sketchy sketchy. i am so fucking sick of people not minding their own business and taking it upon themselves to fucking go around spreading shit about other people when they are in no position/have no fucking right to. why does everyone in ottawa feel the need to muck about in other people's business and take it upon themselves to interfere? people need to learn how to respect others and their business and their lives. and even if they can't appreciate it, it's not their fucking place to get into it. i hate this fucking town

so let's re-cap this fucking brilliant valentine's day, shall we? : woke up. felt so nervous that i threw up. cried. went back to sleep after deciding i can't take going to school on a day where people i cannot stand will be parading around with roses and love letters. woke up and searched room vigorously for chocolate. went upstairs and drank tea while reading the paper with my mom, and read the horoscope section which caused me to sob into my teacup and then retreat back into bed. ran out of chocolate. cried. fed my fish and went on the computer. talked to corey who attempted to make me feel better but just made me miss him alot and cry. mom came down and surprised me with a valentine's day present and she hugged me and i cried. in a good way i think. did some pointless world issues homework. waited for a phonecall that i knew wouldn't come. and now im sitting here typing this. -- you see, there's one big difference between me and you, and that's that i have more heart than you'll ever fucking have.
sleeping with the enemy seems to get the best of me.
some days, i really wish i could just hate you and leave it at that. --- ♥

this is why i fucking love alex: alex(talking to me about the strippers that hit on him): she asked what we were doin new years so i said "making love to some chick i just dont like" then shes like "fucking or making love" so i reply "its starts off as making love until i put it in her butt" HAHAHAHA OH MY GOD I LOVE THIS KID. ♥
